## General Info

Joshua Hunt is an assistant professor at [Mississippi State University](https://www.business.msstate.edu/academics/adkerson-school-accountancy) in the accounting department. He teaches accounting systems 2, which is transitioning to an introduction to accounting data analytics, and he teaches a masters level accounting data analytics course.
